description: The Communications Commission says Stu Peters was "insensitive", but did not breach its code.
title: Stu Peters: Manx Radio presenter cleared over Black Lives Matter comments
title_page: Stu Peters: Manx Radio presenter cleared over Black Lives Matter comments - BBC News
maintext: The commission said there was no evidence there had been any intention "to stir up racial hatred", but it recommended station staff be given "clear guidance and ongoing support and formal training in relation to identifying and dealing with sensitive issues".
